title: Danny & Joel Kim Booster (Fire Island)
itunes:title: Danny & Joel Kim Booster (Fire Island)
description:
Danny chats with star and writer of Hulu's Fire Island (out June 3) Joel Kim Booster! They talk about making the film, plus get into a lot of Housewives, his new standup special (on Netflix June 21), and more!


BOOK: Smarturl.it/unremember

Twitter: @DannyPellegrino

Instagram: @DannyPellegrino

Patreon: www.Patreon.com/EverythingIconic


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
